jjil.algorithm.j2se
Interface HaarClassifierCascade.HaarStageClassifier

Enclosing class:
HaarClassifierCascade
protected static interface HaarClassifierCascade.HaarStageClassifier

A stage classifier applies multiple HaarWeakClassifiers to an image and sums the results. The result is then thresholded and that determines whether the image passes the current stage classifier or not (in a stump-based classifier).

Method Summary
 boolean eval(jjil.core.Gray32Image image)
          Applies a HaarStageClassifier to an image and returns true if the image passes this stage of the Haar classifier cascade, or false if it does not.
 

Method Detail

eval

boolean eval(jjil.core.Gray32Image image)
Applies a HaarStageClassifier to an image and returns true if the image passes this stage of the Haar classifier cascade, or false if it does not. Any image that fails is rejected (in a stump-based classifier).

Parameters:
image - input image.
Returns:
true if the input image passes this stage of the classifer, false if not.
